title: Bug 116609 - Regression: Color orange doesn't work
description: When attempting to use the color orange, it does not work as expected.
OB: The color orange does not appear as expected in the preview.
EB: The color orange should appear correctly in the preview.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the color selection menu.
3. Choose the color orange.
4. Preview the selected color.

Expected result: The color orange should be displayed correctly in the preview.
Actual result: The color orange is not displayed correctly in the preview.
